original_text: Then Joab and his group of soldiers went to fight against the Syrians. As they marched towards the Syrian soldiers, they ran away.
korean_text: 요압과 그 추종자가 싸우려고 아람 사람 앞에 나아가니 그들이 그 앞에서 도망하고

sentences.original_text: Then Joab and his group of soldiers
went to fight against the Syrians
As they marched towards the Syrian soldiers
